knimeNode.name: RDKit Salt Stripper
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node for stripping salts from molecules.

fullDescription.intro: This node is used for removing salts from RDKit molecules and display the salt stripped molecules in an additional column in the output table. The user can optionally input salt definitions into the node. If no salt definition is provided by the user then the default salt definitions will be applied.
fullDescription.option: The name of the column in first table containing RDKit molecules for stripping.
The name of the column in second table containing RDKit molecules as salt definitions. This input is optional and can be left as "None".
Selection box indicating whether or not the original molecule column should be kept.

ports.inPort: Table having at least one RDKit molecule type column containing RDKit molecules for stripping.
Table containing RDKit molecules as salt definitions. This table is optional.
ports.outPort: Table containing one additional column containing salt stripped RDKit molecules.
